meta.description: The professional portfolio of Nam Tran, a passionate IT student and aspiring Developer, showcasing creative projects, skills, and a commitment to lifelong learning.
meta.keywords: Nam Tran Portfolio, Frontend Developer, Web Developer, IT Student, ReactJS, JavaScript, HTML, CSS, Portfolio, Web Projects, Soft Skills, UI/UX Design, AI Chatbot, Tra Vinh, TVC, IT Recruitment, Junior Developer, Software Engineer, Resume, CV, Github
meta.ogDescription: Explore the portfolio of Nam Tran, an aspiring developer with a passion for technology, creative projects, and a solid skill set. Click for more details.

static_text.thankYouLine1: I hope you had an engaging experience exploring Nam Tran's portfolio.
static_text.heroSubtitle: A passionate student driven by a love for technology and a commitment to building meaningful solutions.
static_text.aboutIntro: Hi! I'm Nam Tran, an IT student with a fervent passion for exploring technology and crafting meaningful solutions.
static_text.aboutCore: While my professional journey is just beginning, I bring a strong foundation of eager learning, rapid adaptability, and a proactive work ethic to the table.
static_text.aboutSkills: My part-time roles and extracurricular activities have honed crucial soft skills like communication, time management, and effective problem-solving. I aim to contribute and grow within an innovative environment, applying my knowledge to tackle new challenges and drive project success.
static_text.projectsSubtitle: A selection of personal projects and assignments I've built to practice my skills and explore my passion for technology.
static_text.contactSubtitle: I'm always open to discussing new projects, creative ideas, or opportunities to be part of your vision. Feel free to reach out.

other_translations.exp1Desc: A part-time role to enhance practical experience and essential soft skills.

other_translations.exp1Task2: Effectively communicated and resolved customer inquiries and feedback.
other_translations.exp1Task3: Developed skills in time management, independent work, and performance under pressure.
other_translations.project1Desc: A robust cloud solution designed for seamless organization and secure access to your digital files and folders.
other_translations.project2Desc: An intuitive digital clock and calendar platform, providing real-time information and continuous activity oversight.

other_translations.scrollToTopAria: Scroll to the top of the page
other_translations.tutorialFeature1Desc: Seamlessly switch between two interface modes. The effect is controlled by JavaScript to create a soft 'energy burst' from the cursor's position.
other_translations.tutorialFeature2Desc: Supports English, Vietnamese, Japanese, Korean, Russian, and Chinese. The transition process uses the View Transitions API combined with unique 'Quantum Grid' and 'Chromatic Scramble' effects.
other_translations.tutorialFeature3Desc: A mini control center that allows you to customize the experience: brightness, volume, audio engine, and other quick actions.
other_translations.tutorialFeature4Desc: Long-press the music button to open a full-featured mini-player: album art, progress bar, track controls, and playback modes (Shuffle/Repeat).
other_translations.tutorialFeature5Desc: The starfield background, created with Three.js, reacts and changes color to the music. The music button features a liquid effect and radiating ripples when playing.
other_translations.tutorialFeature6Desc: The mobile experience is carefully crafted with a side-edge sliding navigation bar, ensuring a clean and user-friendly interface.
